#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int a,b,x = 0;
int digit(int temp){
       int sum1 = 0;
       while(temp > 0){
        x = temp%10;

        if(x % 2 == 0)
            sum1 = sum1 + x*2;
        else
            sum1 = sum1 + x;

        temp = temp/10;
    }
    return sum1%10;
}

int main(){
   int t,sum2 = 0;
   scanf("%d",&t);
 //  t = read_int();

while(t--){
    scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
  //  a = read_int();
  //  b = read_int();
   while(a%10!=0 && a < b){
       sum2 += digit(a);
       a++;
   }

   while(b%10!=0 && a < b){
       sum2 += digit(b);
       b--;
    }

    sum2 += (45*((b-a)/10));
    sum2 += (digit(b));


   printf("%d\n",sum2);
 //  write_int(sum2);
 //  putchar_unlocked('\n');
   sum2 = 0;
}
 return 0;
}
